item.title: Volunteer opportunity in Ukraine
item.description: Are you in the fields of Education/Dietetics/Nutrition/Physiotherapy/Occupational Therapy/Speech Pathology? Check out this program conducted by Development Together: * **Who:** Volunteer with our not-for-profit partner at a centre for children with disabilities for between 2-4 weeks. Work with staff to ensure referrals, assessments and implementation of individualised treatment plans occur at this progressive, early intervention facility. OR volunteer at a rehabilitation military hospital for returned soldiers with significant neurological and spinal injuries and collaborate with staff as they focus on rehabilitation therapy and getting clients back into their own homes.
